question: The famous Islamic scholar and philosopher Moinuddin Chishti was also known as
explanation: Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti was an Imam, Islamic scholar and philosopher from South Asia and known as Garib Nawaz (Benefactor of the Poor). He was the founder of the Chishti Order in Lahore (Punjab) and Ajmer (Rajasthan). The Chishti Order is known for its emphasis on love,tolerance, and openness.
